CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(RAG_Status__c, "Green"), IMAGE("/resource/GreenDot", "GreenDot", 24, 24), IF( ISPICKVAL(RAG_Status__c, "RED"), IMAGE("/resource/RedDot", "RedDot", 24, 24), IF( ISPICKVAL(RAG_Status__c, "Amber"), IMAGE("/resource/YellowDot", "YellowDot", 24, 24), null ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Color
